1240:3: yatsattat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmīvivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvo hetuḥ|
1240:9: na punaḥ kāraṇagatau kāryyagatau vā kramākramāvasya vyāpakau|
1240:12: tasmāt kāraṇagatayā kramākramikāryyaviṣayatayā vyāpyamānā kāraṇaśaktiḥ kramākramavyāptetyucyate|
1240:15: tataśca yadyapi sarvvatra kramākramau sattvasya vyāpakāvityādyucyate|
1240:22: kaḥ punarasau vyāptiprasādhako vyāpakānupalambha iti cet|
1240:27: nāsti ca nityābhimatasya bhāvasya kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvamiti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ|
1240:29: nityasya dharmmiṇaḥ kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvena vyāpakena saha virodhasadbhāvāt,
1240:30: tathā hi pūrvvāparakālayorekatve nityatvaṃ kṣaṇadvayepi bhede kramākramitvaṃ|
1240:37: tathā hi na tāvat kramākramābhyāmanyaḥ prakārosti,
1240:47: tathāhi na tāvadayaṃ prasaṅgo hetuḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi pramāṇasidvatvāt,
1240:53: pratīti rhi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt|
1240:54: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ|
1240:57: antimapakṣe tu na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syāt vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāt|
1240:58: api ca tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
1240:67: pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati|
1240:87: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśe ṣāṇi kāryyāṇi kuryyāditi cet|
1240:94: taccāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣviva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye'pi kṣaṇe saditi tadāpi janayet|
1240:98: atrocyate| satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryyañjanayati na tu tenaiva|
1240:103: ye hi kāryyamutpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣāsteṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryyotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kāryye 'nuvarttamāneṣvapi teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthādūnā sāmagrī jāyate|
1240:105: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva karttāro yenāmī niṣpatterārabhya kāryyaṃ vidadyuḥ|
1240:107: na ceyatā svarūpeṇa na karttāraḥ svarūpakārakatvanirvvāhaparatayā vyāpārasamāveśāditi||
1240:108: kiñca kramākramābhāvaśca bhaviṣyati na ca satvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatirekopyayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ|
1240:112: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇāmiti na kramākramābhyāmarthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisidviḥ|
1240:114: kiñca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvamapi parokṣameveti na tāvatpratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati nāpyanumānataḥ,
1240:119: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptamiti tu brūvata vyāpterevābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati|
1240:123: api ca kimidaṃ vādhakamakṣaṇikānāmasattāṃ sādha yati,
1240:131: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā tadvetuḥ syāditi sattvamanaikāntikaṃ|
1240:134: tadā pūrvvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpyo dūṣaṇīyaḥ|
1240:138: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasyacit dṛśyasya pratipattimantareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakya iti|
1240:146: yathā tuhinadahanayoḥ sāpekṣadhruvabhāvayośca pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sanneva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt|
1240:152: tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ kālpaniko vā|
1240:156: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjaliriti|
1240:159: hetoḥ svānubhavasya cākṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo'pi ca|
1240:160: śūnyaśca dvitīyena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasidvirasatā śakyā kramāderapīti||
1240:161: atrocyate| iha vastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭoyathā gavi gotvaṃ,
1240:163: avastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo bandhyāputre vakratvābhāvo gagaṇāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi|
1240:173: yenaiva hi vacanenāvastuno dharmmitvābhāvena dharmmeṇa dharmmatvamabhyupagataṃ|
1240:175: tathāhyavastuno dharmmitvannāstīti vacanena dharmmitvābhāvaḥ kimavastu vidhīyate,
1240:182: tṛtīyastu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvāt iti kathamavastuno dharmmitvaniṣedhaḥ|
1240:185: tathā'vastuno dharmmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso'vastuno dharmmitvasvīkārapūrvvatvena vyāptaḥ|
1240:190: tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balādāyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanavirodhasidviḥ|
1240:192: bruvan vā doṣamimaṃ pariharttumiti mahati saṅkaṭe praveśaḥ|
1240:193: avastuprastāve sahṛdayāṇāṃ mūkataiva yujyata iti cet|
1240:195: avastuprastāve svayameva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāṣayā niḥsarttumicchati|
1240:196: nacāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamarddanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedvuṃ śakyate|
1240:197: tataścātrāpi kramākramābhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastyātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmmitvaṃ kena pratihanyate|
1240:198: trividho hi dharmmo dṛṣṭaḥ kaścidvastuniyato nīlādiḥ|
1240:207: kevalamasau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratīti rvastvavastunorekarūpā na bhavati|
1240:211: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratīti ryathāsākṣātpratyakṣaṃ paramparayā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo'numānañca|
1240:214: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo'pi tu vyavaharttavyaḥ|
1240:218: tataścākṣaṇikasya vikalpamātrasidvatve yaduktaṃ na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syadvikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāditi tatasaṅgataṃ|
1240:219: vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sambhave'pi vastudharmmeṇa dharmmitvāyogāt|
1240:236: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryyakāraṇasāmarthyamasti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt|
1240:240: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti|
1240:242: yadā tāvadamī mīlitāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu ko ni ṣedvā|
1240:248: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryyotpattiranyasmādeva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇāditi vivādapadametat|
1240:249: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatte rnavā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya tata eva kāryyotpattiriti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhati|
1240:252: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñānadūṣaṇamasmābhiḥ sthirasidvidūṣaṇe pratipāditamiti tata evāvadhāryyaṃ|
1240:257: bhavatu tāvannijāgantukabhedena dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tathāpi tatprātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam|
1240:261: na ca kāryyaṃ sahakāriṇo'pekṣata iti yuktaṃ|
1240:263: hetuśca sannapi yadi svakāryyannakaroti tadā tatkāryyameva tanna syāt,
1240:272: kiṃ kurmma uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet|
1240:274: śthiratve'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva kāryyaṃ karotīti cet|
1240:279: kāryye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvādūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayediti cet|
1240:281: sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayorapi sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvamavāryyamiti prāgeva pratipādanāt|
1240:282: kāryyasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ karttumaśakyatvameva kāraṇamasamarthamāvedayati|
1240:284: na ca kramākramābhyāmaparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyāmavyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt|
1240:289: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo'dṛśyatvepyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya dṛśyasyaiva sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣādeva sidhyati|
1240:290: evaṃ kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ byāptamiti kramākramayoranyo'nyavyavacchedena sthitatvādetatprakāradvayaparihāreṇārthakriyākāritvamanyatra na gatamityarthaḥ|
1240:294: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścit vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo'pi tu vikalpādeva vyavaharttavyaḥ|
1240:296: evaṃ vaidharmmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpādeva pratītiḥ|
1240:300: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiñca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvāt iti sthitaṃ|
1240:301: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiriti yadyanupalabdhimātrantadā na tasya sādhyabudvijanakatvamavastutvāt|
1240:302: na cānyopalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhirabhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivat anyasya kasyacidanupalabdheriti cet tadasaṅgataṃ|
1240:304: yathā neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvādityatra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhirdṛśyānupalabdhiḥ|
1240:305: śiṃśapāpekṣayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhireva śiṃśapābhāvopalabdhiriti svabhāvahetuparyyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ|
1240:306: tathā hi nityasya dharmmiṇo vikalpabudvyadhyavasi tasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇameva kramikāritvā kramikāritvānupalambha arthakriyāpekṣayā ca|
1240:315: ayañca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmmiṇi tathā'vastubhūte'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ|
1240:319: tathā nīlādāvapariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmmiṇā sārdvaṃ ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau nitye'pi yadi bhavataḥ|
1240:320: nityagrāhiṇā jñānena svadharmmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātāmiti sambhāvanayā|
1240:323: yāvatā kramākramakroḍīkṛtameva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cet|
1240:327: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryyaśakteśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatayā durvvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayorantarbhāvaḥ|
1240:338: yadyādyaḥ pakṣastadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāśca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastuprativadvatvamapi na kṣīṇaṃ|
1240:339: na ca dvitīye'pi pakṣe doṣaḥ sambhavati|
1240:343: paryyudāsavṛttyā budvisvabhāva bhūtā kṣaṇikākāre vastubhūte dharmmiṇi prativadvatvasambhavāt|
1240:344: ayameva nyāyo na vaktā bandhyāsutaścaitanyābhāvādityādau yojyaḥ|
1240:345: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādityādyantarbhāvayituṃ śakyo na tathāyamiti trilocano'pi nirastaḥ|
1240:355: tacca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisidvau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatītyabhāvadharmmatvaṃ prāgeva vidhyorvyāptisādhakāt pratyakṣādanumānātmakādvā pramāṇāntarāt sidva miti netaretarāśrayatvadoṣaḥ|
1240:356: na ca sattāyāmivāsattāyāmapi tulyaprasaṅgo bhinna nyāyatvāt|
1240:361: asattāsādhane tvavastudharmmā heturavastuni vikalpamātrasidve dharmmiṇi nāśrayāsidvidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ|
1240:369: tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇika svarūpasya tat pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt|
1240:374: na hi virodhonāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādaṃ sambadvābhidhānamiṣyate'smābhirupapadyate vā|
1240:379: nāpyabhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo'yamanayorasaṅkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ|
1240:382: nanu nityatvakramayaugapadyavattvañca virudvau vidhūya nāparo virodhonāma|
1240:385: na hi dharmmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ|
1240:386: kintu virudvayordharmmayoḥ sadbhāve'nyathā virodhanāmadharmmāntarasambhave'pi yadi na virudvau dharmmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasadbhāvaḥ|
1240:387: virudvau ca dharmmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ|
1240:391: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo'pi ca|
1240:392: śūnyaśca dvitayena sidhyati na vā sattāpi sattāyathā
1240:401: tataśca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvādakṣaṇikādvinivarttamānamidaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatva eva viśrāmyante na vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviṃravirodhinī||
